title: ᴘᴇɴ ᴘᴀɪɴᴛ ᴀᴘᴘ
instructions:
ɴᴇᴡ ɢᴀᴍᴇ ʀᴇʟᴇᴀꜱᴇᴅ! ᴘᴀɪɴᴛ ʏᴏᴜʀ ᴡᴏʀʟᴅ ᴜꜱɪɴɢ ᴛʜɪꜱ ᴄᴏᴏʟ ᴘᴇɴ ᴘʀᴏᴊᴇᴄᴛ! 
-----------------------------------------------------------------
ɪɴꜱᴛʀᴜᴄᴛɪᴏɴꜱ:
ʜᴏʟᴅ ʏᴏᴜʀ ᴍᴏᴜꜱᴇ ᴛᴏ ᴅʀᴀᴡ
ᴅʀᴀɢ ᴛʜᴇ ꜱʟɪᴅᴇʀꜱ ᴛᴏ ᴄʜᴀɴɢᴇ ᴛʜᴇ ᴅᴀʀᴋɴᴇꜱꜱ ᴀɴᴅ ᴛʜɪᴄᴋɴᴇꜱꜱ
ᴡ ꜰᴏʀ ᴀ ᴡʜɪᴛᴇ ʙᴀᴄᴋɢʀᴏᴜɴᴅ
ʙ ꜰᴏʀ ᴀ ʙʟᴀᴄᴋ ʙᴀᴄᴋɢʀᴏᴜɴᴅ
ʀɪɢʜᴛ ᴀɴᴅ ʟᴇꜰᴛ ᴀʀʀᴏᴡ ᴋᴇʏꜱ ꜰᴏʀ ᴄᴏʟᴏʀ ʙᴀᴄᴋɢʀᴏᴜɴᴅꜱ
ᴄʟɪᴄᴋ ᴏɴ ᴄɪʀᴄʟᴇꜱ ᴛᴏ ᴄʜᴏᴏꜱᴇ ᴄᴏʟᴏʀ
-----------------------------------------------------------------
ᴛʜᴀɴᴋꜱ ᴛᴏ ɢᴇᴏᴍᴇᴛʀʏ ᴅᴀꜱʜ ꜰᴏʀ ᴛʜᴇ ᴍᴜꜱɪᴄ!
ᴀʟʟ ᴄᴏᴅᴇ ᴀɴᴅ ᴀʀᴛ ᴀʀᴇ ʙʏ ᴍᴇ, @ʟᴀᴢʏ_ᴄᴏᴅᴇʀ02! 
ᴇɴᴊᴏʏ!

title: Which Scratcher Are You Most Like?
description:
i did one of these back in 2018 but i wanted to make another because i think these quizzes are interesting.
.
.
.
~.*~~.*~~.*~~.*~~.*~~.*~~.*~~.*~~.*~~.*~
follow me @D_i_a_v_l_o for more projects!
~.*~~.*~~.*~~.*~~.*~~.*~~.*~~.*~~.*~~.*~
.
.
.
.
a couple hours ago i broke this by removing a wait block. after removing the wait block, the calculation script and the costume script showing the results happened at the same time. the program prioritized the costume script so it wouldnt do the calculation in time for the results to show, resulting in everyone getting fajtv as their result.

the scratchers included in this project are funnyanimatorjimtv, racinghans, danison, crystalkeeper7, -cinematic-, potatobear616, 7sofa, berricake and birdah. 

i had to ask these scratchers some questions so i could put them into this quiz, which is why griffpatch and others arent in it, because i dont know enough about them

#mobile #mobilefriendly #quiz #scratcher #diavlo #D_i_a_v_l_o 

music by gyvus

title: Bunny Clicker (Mobile Friendly)
instructions:
Welcome to Bunny Clicker! We all need more bunnies in our lives, don't you think? ;D 

(tell me if there are any glitches, first clicker game :P)
 
• • • • • 

- Step one: Click the bunny to get carrots!
- Step two: Use the carrots to get new avatars in the shop! (Shop button is the one with the shopping basket.) The more expensive the avatar, the more carrots you get per click!
º Objective: Try to get as many carrots as possible, get the most expensive avatar, and add to the world clicks!

Remix prompt: Design your own bunnies, or use this as a template to make your own clicker game! :D

• • • • •

✎ Art by me :) Except I used a picture online as a reference for the bunny that you click. 
✂ Code also by me
☆ Inspired by 'Positivity Clicker'
✒ Some fonts from BeFunky

• • • • •

#bunny #bunnies #game #games #clicker #rainbow #gold #art

Update Log:
- Made bunnies harder to get- changed prices

title: Japanese Text Engine v0.02 - 日本語のテクストエンジン
description:
(This is mainly for my own Japanese practice, so you can ignore this if you have no idea what's going on, lol.
I'm working on regular projects, I promise)

Hi! This is a Japanese Text Engine.
こんにちは！これは日本語のテクストエンジンです。

Right now it has Hiragana and Katakana, but no Kanji.
I want to add kanji soon.
今はひらがなとカタカナありて、漢字がありません。
私はすぐに漢字を作りたい。

This took a long time to make (typing the characters), so please give credit if you use it. Anyone can.
Also, anyone can remix and add Kanji.
ながい時間は作った (字をタイプした)、プロジェクトに私の名まえを書くをください。みなできる。
そして、みなはリーミクスて、漢字をして、できる。

I am sorry for my bad Japanese - I have been learning since June. I made this because I wanted to use this to make Japanese versions of games someday.
私の日本語はわるいです、すみません。六月から日本語を勉強する。私はいつ日本語ゲームを作りたいから、これが作った。

Thank you - I will make some better projects soon.
私はすぐにもっといいプロジェクトを作ります。
ありがとうございます。

title: ꜱᴋᴇᴛᴄʜᴇᴅ 2 : ᴀ ᴘʟᴀᴛꜰᴏʀᴍᴇʀ

title: Non-Euclidean Lemon Grab Experiment
description:
★★★ Tutorials on YouTube ★★★
https://www.youtube.com/user/griffpatch

★★★ Non-Euclidean Lemon Grab Test ★★★
I watched this awesome video on YouTube showing a funky 3d Non-Euclidean world where things somehow were not what they seemed. I wanted to see if I could create a relatively seamless 2d version - so enjoy this little experiment :) - Don't get lost - lol.

★★★ Controls ★★★
Simple... Find all the lemons using the the cursor keys, WASD or Mobile.

★★★ Best Time ★★★
Best time is 54.4s by @TheGoodGuy8000

P.S. Don't worry too much about the timer - that's just there in-case you want something to beat - the real fun is just in exploring the level and making sense of it :) - Enjoy!

Little more about the level - So, there are no tricks, in that nothing is changing randomly - You take the same path in two plays, it will result in the same result. However, do not assume that turning right 4 times in a passage will actually lead back to the same place you started - in an Non-Euclidean world rules like this do not apply... Rooms that are small on the outside can be big inside, and big rooms, can be tiny, etc... it's all very fun :)

title: The Heist Movie
description:
Youtube version: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2x9NGAVXkgs (Thanks @PaddlerGames!)

(Spoiler warning below!)
The backstory if anyone was wondering:


The city wasn't doing so well. The mayor and military weren't helping a bit, they were making living there worse. Life was hard and little money was being made. My character decided to steal a diamond and make money off that to make life a bit easier. In the end, when Commander Red is defeated after hurting an innocent person, my character became mayor and made a new military, and the city did much better.

#animation #animations #jwhandle #heist #stickfigure #theheist #art #stories #story #theheistmovie
instructions:
The Heist Movie
Run time: 12:58
Heart, star and follow for a diamond
=============================================
Tip: Spam the flag, and then when the guy goes down the rope spam the flag again and continue watching. This reduces lag. Fullscreen might cause it to crash.
=============================================
CREDITS:
@awesomeal82 for speech bubble code
@eloctrasyd for original walk and punch animations (edited a lot by me)
@WazzoTV for lots of inspiration, go see this Slatch and Scratch Saga
@Paralyzed_Potato for inspiration for the original heist episode
Some sound effects from Star Wars
Music is Mission impossible theme, other sound effects from youtube
All other animation, code and art was made by me, @JWhandle.
=============================================
Fan art winners:
@emax18:
https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/394636816/
@JazzLynda:
https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/394241295/
@TheBirdieRockey
https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/394287738/
Congrats to these people, and the 10,000 follower fan art contest project is still shared so you can look at all the other entries :)
=============================================
This took about 3 months to make. Enjoy this animation!

A note to the ST and anyone who might report this: Please don't NFE this or take it down. I worked really hard on this, and I want people to see it. I tried very hard to make it for all ages, and there is little to no violence. Nothing graphic. Thanks :) Read the backstory in the credits for more explanation

title: Art Process // Detailed Tutorial
description:
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
Character belongs to me (redesigned and my character is from a Closed Species called Chaimis by Papertsubaki on Toyhou.se)
Music - Falling to Pieces
Full art by me 
Time taken - 4 hours and 2 hours for coding 
Program used - ibispaint
Zoom code - @colorsnatch
Flying leaves - @Rosyda
Do not steal, trace, sell or claim my art as your own. Please don't reference heavily and give credits if i've given you permission to reference slightly.

Fanart is welcome :)
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
instructions:
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 
Many people requested this so I decided to make it :)
Fullscreen for better quality and click to zoom <3
Art process - Press space
1. Sketch
2. Lineart
3. Base Colours
4. Shading 1
5. Rest of Shading
6. Colouring Lineart
7. Lighting
8. Lighting 2
9. Background
10. Complete :)
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

title: Tower Defense Game | McGuy | Updates
description:
If you like this game then a ❤️,⭐ and a FOLLOW for @aairfanf and me would be very appreciated!
=========================================
Credits -
@aairfanf Project - https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/412474186/

@FunnyAnimatorJimTV for the sound effects from Fortnite Z
=========================================
I used McGuy tutorial for this, but I just fixed some bugs like some of the shop glitches, made it so you don't need to click the green flag multiple times, made it a little less laggy by using the blank sprite trick, and added sound effects! I may update this game more :D

McGuys Tutorial - https://scratch.mit.edu/discuss/youtube/DKrV9fFSl4I/

#Games #All #Tower #Defense #Game #Art #Tutorial  #Music #2020 #Animations #Love #Favorite #Follow
instructions:
Tower Defense Game | McGuy | Updates
                           @DuckGoose9254
=========================================
Start the game by clicking the shop button, there you will find that you can buy the turrets that have the light colored button meaning you have enough money to buy the turret. Click to turret to be able to place it wherever you like except the brown path. Use the arrow keys to turn the turret to the place you want. Then click Start Wave to see if you can pop all the balloons! Repeat the process until you lose or you've had enough! Try to get the world record!

Have Fun! 

Please keep the comment section clean!
=========================================


































Make sure to Subscribe to my YT: DuckGoose9254
